333a4(mdo 'grel): pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas/ srid pa 'gag srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /bskye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba
333a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /rkyen ni khams drug ste/ sa dang/ chu dang/
333a6(mdo 'grel): me dang/ rlung dang/ nam mkha' dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /de dag kyang rnam pa lngar blta ste/ rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ 'pho bar ma yin pa dang/ rgyu chu
333a7(mdo 'grel): du las 'bras bu chen por 'byung ba dang/ de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud do/ /rgyu drug ni byed pa'i rgyu dang/ lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang/ skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu dang/ mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang/ kun tu
333b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro pa'i rgyu dang/ rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'o/ /rkyen gzhi ni dmigs pa'i rkyen dang/ bdag po'i rkyen dang/ de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang/ rgyu'i rkyen no/ /'bras bu lnga ni/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang/ rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras
333b2(mdo 'grel): bu dang/ bral ba'i 'bras bu dang/ skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang/ bdag po'i 'bras bu dang/ bden pa gnyis ni/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang/ don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /kun rdzob kyi bden ba la yang gnyis
333b3(mdo 'grel): te/ yang dag pa'i kun rdzob dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun rdzob bo/ /mtshan nyid gsum ni kun brtags dang/ gzhan dbang dang/ yongs su grub pa'o/ /chos lnga ni ming dang/ rgyu mtshan dang/ rnam
333b4(mdo 'grel): par rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /bdag med ba gnyis ni/ chos la bdag med pa dang/ gang zag la bdag med pa'o/ /theg pa gsum ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang
333b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po'o/ /dkon mchog gsum po ni/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog go /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
333b6(mdo 'grel): bdun ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do//
333b7(mdo 'grel): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang bzhi'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
334a1(mdo 'grel): mi bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa bskyed pa dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas
334a2(mdo 'grel): par bya ba dang/ phyir bzhin 'byung ba dang/ nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ sems kyi
334a3(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang/ spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang
334a4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /stobs lnga ni/ dad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ chos rnam
334a5(mdo 'grel): par 'byed ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan
334a6(mdo 'grel): lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' dang/ yang dag pa'i tsho ba dang/
334a7(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /lam lnga ni/ tshogs kyi lam dang/ sbyor ba'i lam dang/ mthong ba'i lam dang/ sgom pa'i lam dang/ mthar phyin pa'i lam mo/ /tshogs kyi lam lnga ni/ so so
334b1(mdo 'grel): skye bo'i tshul khrims dang/ dbang po'i sgo bsdam pa dang/ zas kyi tshod shes pa dang/ nam gyi cha stod cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang/ shes bzhin du gnas pa la mngon par dga' ba'o/ /sbyor ba'i lam ni/ mos pa spyod pa'i sa bzhi ste/ snang ba thob par
334b2(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang/ snang ba mched pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de kho na don tshig gi phyogs gcig tu zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de ma thag pa sems kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /mthong ba'i lam ni byang chub sems dpa' i sa dang po'o/ /sgom pa'i lam ni/ sa gnyis pa nas sa
334b3(mdo 'grel): bcu pa'i bar du'o/ /mthar phyin pa'i lam ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
334b4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems pa'i sa bcu ni/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ 'od
334b5(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang/ 'od 'phro ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs dka' ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa dang/ ring du song ba dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ legs pa'i blo gros dang/ chos kyi sprin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa ni kun tu 'ong ngo/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang
334b6(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum ni/ chos kyi sku dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ sprul pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/
334b7(mdo 'grel): chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
335a1(mdo 'grel): bas byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/ zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/ bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du ma 'gyur bar nges par lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
335a2(mdo 'grel): thob par 'gyur ba la nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin nyid du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i drug ni/ lha'i mig dang/ lha'i rna ba dang/ sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang/ lus kyi rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang/ sngon
335a3(mdo 'grel): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang/ zag pa zad pa shes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ gnas pa dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs
335a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ thams cad tu 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par
335a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa bzhi dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ zag pa thams
335a6(mdo 'grel): cad zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /dbang bcu ni tshe la dbang ba dang/ yo byad la dbang ba dang/ sems la dbang ba dang/ las la dbang ba dang/ skye ba la dbang ba dang/ mos pa la dbang ba dang/ smon lam la dbang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba
335a7(mdo 'grel): /chos la dbang ba dang/ ye shes la dbang ba dang/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba dang/ ca co mi mnga' ba dang/ bsnyel ba med pa dang/ sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa
335b1(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang/ so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang/ 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang/ shes rab mnyam pa med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang/ lus kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du
335b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro zhing/ me shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ dag gi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ yid kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma
335b3(mdo 'grel): chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa'o/ /sde snod
335b4(mdo 'grel): gsum ni/ mdo sde'i sde snod dang/ 'dul ba'i sde snod dang/ chos mngon pa'i sde snod do/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ni/ mdo'i sde dang/ dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa'i sde dang/ lung du bstan pa'i sde dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ chad du brjod
335b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sde dang/ gleng gzhi'i sde dang/ rtogs pa rjod pa'i sde dang/ de lta bur byung pa'i sde dang/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ smad du 'byung ba'i sde dang/ gtan la phab pa'i sde'o/ /dgongs pa bzhi ni/ mnyam pa nyid la dgongs
335b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang/ don gzhan la dgongs pa dang/ gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa'o/ /sdem por dgongs pa bzhi ni/ gzhug pa la ldem por dgongs pa dang/ mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa dang/ gzhen po la ldem por dgongs pa dang bsgyur ba la ldem?
335b7(mdo 'grel): por dgongs pa'o/ /bden pa bzhi ni/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mo sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzhi ste/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stongs pa dang/ bdag med pa'o/ /kun 'byung gi bden pa la yang rnam pa
336a1(mdo 'grel): bzhi ste/ kun 'byung dang/ rgyu dang/ rkyen dang/ rab tu 'byed pa'o/ /'gog pa'i bden pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'gog pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ gya nom pa dang/ nges par 'byung ba'o/ /lam la yang bzhi ste/ lam dang/ rigs pa dang/ sgrub pa
336a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ nges par 'byin pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi tshogs lam lnga ste/ so so skye bo'i tshul khrims dang/ dbang po'i sgo bsdam pa dang/ zas kyi tshod shes pa dang/ nam gyi cha stod cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang/ shes bzhin du gnas
336a3(mdo 'grel): mngon par dga' ba'o/ /sbyor ba'i lam ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi ste/ drod dang/ rtse mo dang/ bzod pa dang/ 'jig rten chos kyi mchog go /mthong ba'i lam ni sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug go /bsgoms pa'i lam ni/ lam chung ngu dang/ lam
336a4(mdo 'grel): 'bring po dang/ lam chen po dang/ sbyor ba'i lam dang/ bar chad med pa'i lam dang/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang/ khyad par gyi lam mo/ /lam chung ngu la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ chung ngu'i chung ngu dang/ chung ngu'i 'bring po dang/ chung ngu'i chen po'o/ /
336a5(mdo 'grel): lam 'bring po la yang gsum ste/ che 'bring chung gsum mo/ /lam chen po la yang gsum ste/ che 'bring chung gsum mo/ /mthar phyin pa'i lam ni/ /mi slob pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi shes pa bcu drug ni/ sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ sdug bsngal
336a6(mdo 'grel): la chos shes pa dang/ sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/ /kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ kun 'byung la chos shes pa dang/ kun 'byung la rjes su rtogs par
336a7(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ kun 'byung la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/ /'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ 'gog pa la chos shes pa dang/ 'gog pa la chos rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ 'gog pa la rjes su
336b1(mdo 'grel): rtogs par shes pa'o/ /lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ lam la chos shes pa dang/ lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang/ lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o nyan thos kyi rnam par bral ba'i lam ni brgyad de/ 'jug pa bzhi dang/ 'bras
336b2(mdo 'grel): bu la gnas pa bzhi'o/ /'jug pa bzhi ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba la 'jug pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba la 'jug pa'i dang/ ngag bcom pa la 'jug pa'o/ /'bras bu la ni/ gnas pa bzhi ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa
336b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa ni gnyis te/ rim gyis pa dang/ cig char nges pa 'byin pa'o/ /rim gyis pa ni/ ji skad bstan pa yin no/ /cig car nges par 'byung ba ni /gang bden
336b4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams mngon par rtogs par byas nas/ mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi khams gsum na spyod pa'i/ /nyon mong pa cig car spong ste/ 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid la gnas
336b5(mdo 'grel): so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni gnyis te/ bse ru ltar gcig tu gnas pa dang/ tshogs? dang spyod pa'o/ /de ni nyan thos sde snod la dmigs nas/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos grub pas/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sdug bsngal mthar
336b6(mdo 'grel): 'byin? pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi lam ni brgyad de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ snyoms par 'jug ba bzhi'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni dang po dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa'o/ /snyom par 'jug pa bzhi ni nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes
336b7(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas skye mched dang/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min skye mched do/ /bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste/ rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan 
337a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste/ nang rab tu dang ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /gsum pa la yan lag lnga ste/ btang snyoms dang/ dran ba dang/ shes bzhin dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan
337a2(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa la yan lag bzhi ste/ btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang/ dran pa yongs su dag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /yang gnyen po'i yan lag dang/ phan yon gyi yan lag dang/ de gnyi ga'i gnas kyi
337a3(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gyi yan lag go /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang/ nad gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba dang/ sdug pa'i rnam pa mngon du byas nas gnas pa dang/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched dang
337a4(mdo 'grel): rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched dang/ ci yod med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched dang/ 'du shes dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'gog pa mngon du byas nas gnas pa'o/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ni dkar po dang/ dmar po
337a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ ser po dang/ sngon po dang/ sdug pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ bzang po dang/ ngan pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ mi rtog pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes  
337a6(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas skye mched dang/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched dang/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /zad par gyi skye mched bcu ni/ zad par dkar po'i skye mched dang/ zad par dmar po'i skye mched dang/ zad
337a7(mdo 'grel): par ser po'i skye mched dang/ zad par sngon po'i skye mched dang/ zad par sa'i skye mched dang/ zad par chu'i skye mched dang/ zad par me'i skye mched dang/ zad par rlung gi skye mched dang/ zad par nam mkha' i skye mched dang/ zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched do/ /sems
337b1(mdo 'grel): can gyi khams gsum ni/ 'dod khams/ gzugs khams/ gzugs med pa'o/ /'dod pa'i khams na sems can gyi ris nyi shu gnas te/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad dang/ grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad do/ /nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni/ gcig gam gnyis
337b2(mdo 'grel): mang po rang rang gi rgyu las grub pa'o/ /dud 'gro ni chu dang thang dang nam mkha' i spyod yul lo/ /yi dags rnams ni/ /chos kyi rgyal po shin rje'i pho brang na'o/ /ming glang bzhi ni/ ba lang spyod sgra mi snyan lus 'phags po 'dzam bu gling /lha'i ris drug ni/ rgyal chen ris
337b3(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do/ /gzugs khams bcu bdun ni/ tshangs pa dang/ tshangs chen dang/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don no/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa la/ 'od chung dang/
337b4(mdo 'grel): 'od gsal/ tshad med 'od do/ bsam gtan gsum pa la ni/ dge chung dang/ dge rgyas dang/ tshad med dge'o/ /bzhi pa la/ sprin med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che'o/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha lnga ni/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ gya nom
337b5(mdo 'grel): snang ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ 'og min rnams so/ /gzugs med pa'i lha ris bzhi ni/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang
337b6(mdo 'grel): 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'o/ /chos kyi rnam grang chung ngu A tsarya dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //pho brang stong thang ldan dkar gyi bkad dang bstan bcos 'gyur ro cog gi dkar chag dpal rtsegs dang nam mkha' i snying pos mdzad do//
337b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum la sogs te/ bod kyi rgyal khams su dam pa'i chos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi mtshan byang dkar chag bris shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs kyi 'dung sa nas/ 'brug gi lo la po
338a1(mdo 'grel): brang ldan dkar na bzhugs pa'i ston/ sgra sgyur gyi bande dpal rtsegs dang/ bande klu'i dbang po la sogs pas dam pa'i chos theg pa che chung gi mdo sde dang/ gzugs che phra dang/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ bstod pa dang/ smon lam dang/
338a2(mdo 'grel): bkra shis dang/ 'dul ba'i sde snod dang/ mdo sde'i TIka dang/ dbu ma'i bstan bcos dang/ bsam gtan gyi yi ge dang/ rnam par shes pa'i bstan bcos dang/ tar ka'i gzhung la sogs pa bod khams su chos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi mtshan byad bam po dang/
338a3(mdo 'grel): shlo ka'i grangs du mchis pa gtan la phab nas yi ger bris pa/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa la/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /stong phrag brgya pa/ shlo ka 'bum/ bam po sum brgya/
338a4(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ shlo ka nyi khri lnga stong/ bam po brgyad cu rtsa gsum dang/ shlo ka brgya/ 'phags pa khri brgyad stong pa/ shlo ka khri brgyad stong/ bam po drug cu/ 'phags pa khri pa/ shlo ka khri/ bam po sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ shlo ka brgya/
338a5(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa brgyad stong pa/ shlo ka brgyad stong/ bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang/ shlo ka brgya/ 'phags pa rab gyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ shlo ka nyis stong chig brgya drug cu ste/ bam po bdun dang/ shlo ka drug cu /'phags pa bdun brgya pa/ shlo ka
338a6(mdo 'grel): bdun brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang/ shlo ka brgya/ 'phags pa lnga brgya pa/ shlo ka brgya ste/ bam po gcig dang/ shlo ka gnyis brgya/ 'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa/ shlo ka gsum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa sdus pa tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka sum
338a7(mdo 'grel): brgya ste/ bam po gcig/ 'phags pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ shlo ka brgya lnga bcu/ 'phags pa lnga bcu pa/ shlo ka lnga bcu/ 'phags pa kau shi ka /shlo ka sum cu rtsa gcig /'phags pa shes rab snying po/ shlo ka nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ 'phags pa sgo'i?/ ?
338b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ shlo ka nyi shu rtsa lnga/ 'phags pa yi ge nyung ngu/ shlo ka sum cu tham ba// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa la/ 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde sangs rgyas phal po che/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga
338b2(mdo 'grel): yan chad la shlo ka sum khri dgu stong sum cu ste/ bam po brgya sum cu dang/ shlo ka sum cu yod pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'ur gtogs pa la shlo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bcu bzhi/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan
338b3(mdo 'grel): gyis yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u/ shlo ka sum stong dgu brgya ste/ bam po bcu gsum/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' i sa bcu bstan ba/ shlo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po brgyad/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bstan pa/ shlo ka bzhi stong
338b4(mdo 'grel): brgyad brgya ste/ bam po bcu drug 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung bstan pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u/ shlo ka sum stong sum brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig/ 'phags pa sdong? po
338b5(mdo 'grel): bkod pa'i mdo/ /shlo ka dgu stong ste/ bam po sum cu tham pa// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa'i le'ur gtogs pa la/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yan chad las
338b6(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa sdom pa gsum bstan pa/ shlo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/ 'phags pa sgo mdza' yas pa rnam par spyod ba/ shlo ka stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bzhi/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ shlo
338b7(mdo 'grel): ka sum stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig dang/ shlo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa/ shlo ka stong ste/ bam po gsum dang/ shlo ka brgya/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod ba/ shlo ka dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum/ 'phags pa tha
339a1(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya bzhi bcu ste/ bam po lnga dang/ shlo ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa go cha bkod pa/ shlo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug/ 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyi dbyer med par bstan pa/ shlo ka

349b3(mdo 'grel): ka bzhi bcu/ 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba/ shlo ka bco brgyad/ 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ shlo ka sum cu/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ shlo ka dgu bcu rtsa bdun/ 'phags pa smon lam bdun
349b4(mdo 'grel): cu pa/ shlo ka brgyad cu rtsa gsum/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ shlo ka nyi shu rtsa gsum/ rin po che phreng ba'i smon lam/ shlo ka bco brgyad/ byang chub dam pa'i smon lam/ shlo ka phye dang bcu bzhi/ byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon lam/ shlo ka
349b5(mdo 'grel): bcu tham pa// //bkra shis kyi rnam grangs la/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa chen po/ shlo ka sum cu/ shis pa brjed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka lnga bcu/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka nyi shu rtsa drug /bkra shis su bya ba'i
349b6(mdo 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka bcu bdun/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka sum cu rtsa phye dang lnga/ yang bde legs su bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka bcu gnyis?/ yang bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ shlo ka dgu// //'dul ba'i sde snod
349b7(mdo 'grel): la/ 'dul ba lung bzhi/ shlo ka sum khri nyis stong bdun brgya ste/ bam po brgya rtsa dgu/ 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ shlo ka nyi khri bzhi stong dgu brgya ste/ bam po brgyad cu rtsa gsum/ 'dul ba phran tshigs kyi gzhi/ shlo ka nyi khri bzhi stong drug brgya ste/
350a1(mdo 'grel): bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/ 'dul ba gzhung bla ma/ shlo ka khri drug stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ 'dul ba zhus lan/ shlo ka sum stong sum brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig yan chad 'gyur/ dge slong
350a2(mdo 'grel): ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ shlo ka bdun stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po nyi shu bzhi dang/ shlo ka nyis brgya/ dge slong ba'i so so thar pa'i mdo/ /shlo ka sum stong drug brgya ste/ bam po bcu gnyis dang/ shlo ka brgya/ dge slong ma'i so sor
350a3(mdo 'grel): thar pa'i mdo/ shlo ka brgyad brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang/ shlo ka nyis brgya/ 'dul ba mdo/ shlo ka nyis stong bdun brgya ste/ bam po dgu las brgya rtsa gcig pa/ shlo ka sum stong drug brgya ste/ bam po bcu gnyis/ 'dul ba bsdus ba/ shlo
350a4(mdo 'grel): ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bco lnga/ 'dul ba bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ shlo ka sum stong sum brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig /'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig gi bshad pa/ shlo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya/ bam po bco lnga/ 'dul ba phran tshegs
350a5(mdo 'grel): 'grel pa/ shlo ka sum stong ste/ bam po bcu/ 'dul ba gzhung bla ma'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ shlo ka drug stong/ bam po nyi shu/ so so thar pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa chen po shlo ka sum khri sum stong drug brgya ste/ bam po brgya rtsa bcu gnyis
350a6(mdo 'grel): so so thar pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ 'dul ba kun las btus pa/ shlo ka khri lnga stong ste/ bam po lnga bcu/ so sor thar pa'i gzhung 'grel/ shlo ka brgyad stong chig brgya ste/ bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun/ yang so sor thar pa'i 'grel pa/
350a7(mdo 'grel): shlo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ so sor thar pa'i tshig gi brjed byed/ shlo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ 'dul mdo'i rgya
350b1(mdo 'grel): cher 'grel pa/ shlo ka nyi khri chig stong ste/ bam po bdun cu/ thams cad yod par smra ba dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ shlo ka lnga bcu/ tshig le'ur byas pa sum brgya pa/ shlo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig/ sum brgya pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa
350b2(mdo 'grel): 'od ldan/ shlo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po brgyad/ 'dul ba dri ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ shlo ka brgya/ 'dul ba dri ba'i tshig gi rgya cher bshad pa/ shlo ka stong drug brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/ bam po lnga dang/ shlo ka brgya drug cu
350b3(mdo 'grel): rtsa bzhi/ sde pa bco brgyad kyi ming dang rim pa/ slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa/ shlo ka drug cu rtsa lnga/ gzhung tha dad pa klag pa'i 'khor lo las /bde ba tha dad pa bstan pa/ slob dpon dbyig bshes kyis mdzad pa/ shlo ka lnga bcu/
350b4(mdo 'grel): dge slong gi tshul/ mkhan po bo d+hi satwas mdzad pa/ shlo ka lnga bcu/ ma byin par len pa'i skabs na/ mkhan po bzhis dpyad pa/ shlo ka nyi shu// //theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i TI kA la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
350b5(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'bum gyi 'grel pa chen po/ shlo ka nyi khri gsum stong bzhi brgya ste/ bam po bdun cu rtsa brgyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum dang/ nyi khri lnga stong dang/ khri brgyad stong pa rgya cher bshad pa/ shlo ka brgyad stong
350b6(mdo 'grel): tshig brgya ste/ bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong ba'i rgya cher bshad pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i brgyan/ shlo ka drug ste/ bam po gnyis/ mngon par rtogs pa'i brgyan gyi rgya cher 'grel
350b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga/ 'phags pa sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'grel ba/ shlo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya ba'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon bi ma?
351a1(mdo 'grel): mi tras mdzad pa/ shlo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ yang bdun brgya pa'i bshad pa/ slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/ shlo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug yang bdun brgya pa'i 'grel

351a3(mdo 'grel): bcu pa'i 'grel pa/ gsang sngags kyi tshul du bshad pa/ shlo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga/ yang

351a7(mdo 'grel): khri nyi stong ste/ bam po bzhi bcu/ yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i byams pa'i le'u nyi rtse bshad pa/ slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa/ shlo ka drug brgya bdun cu ste/ bam po gnyis dang/ shlo ka bdun cu/

351b6(mdo 'grel): bzhi bcu/ sangs rgyas sa las tshig gi don bsdus pa/ shlo ka brgyad cu/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i 'od srungs kyi le'u'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug /'phags pa don dam pa'i chos
351b7(mdo 'grel): kyi rnam grangs kyi 'grel pa/ shlo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ 'phags pa sA lu ljang pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ shlo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po gcig dang/ shlo ka brgya lnga bcu/ sA lu ljang pa'i

354b1(mdo 'grel): sum bcu/ don gsang ba bsdus pa/ shlo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bcu bzhi/ chos mngon pa kun las btus pa/ shlo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po drug /de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka sum stong sum brgya ste/ bam
354b2(mdo 'grel): po bcu gcig/ mdo sde rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ shlo ka dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum/ mdo sde rgyan gyi bshad pa/ shlo ka sum stong nyis brgya bdun cu ste/ bam po bcu dang/ shlo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/ mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel bshad/ shlo ka sum
354b3(mdo 'grel): stong drug brgya ste/ bam po bcu gnyis/ dbus dang mdza' rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ shlo ka bdun cu/ de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka drug brgya bzhi bcu ste/ bam po gnyis dang/ shlo ka bzhi bcu/ de'i 'grel bshad/ shlo ka
354b4(mdo 'grel): sum stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig dang/ shlo ka nyis brgya/ phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa/ shlo ka brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis/ phung po lnga'i rnam par bshad pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya lnga bcu rtsa gcig ste/ bam po lnga dang/ shlo ka lnga bcu
354b5(mdo 'grel): rtsa gcig /phung po lnga'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/ shlo ka bdun brgya ste/ bam po gnyis dang/ shlo ka brgya/ phung po lnga'i bshad pa/ slob dpon sa'i rtsa lag gis mdzad pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya ste/
354b6(mdo 'grel): bam po lnga/ phung po lnga'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon blo gros brtan pas mdzad pa/ shlo ka stong nyi brgya ste bam po bzhi/ sum cu pa'i rab tu byed pa/ shlo ka sum cu/ sum cu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon blo gros brtan pas
354b7(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa/ /shlo ka bdun brgya ste/ bam pa gnyis dang/ shlo ka brgya/ sum cu pa'i 'grel bshad/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste/ bam po lnga dang/ shlo ka bdun cu rtsa lnga/ nyi shu pa'i rab tu byed pa shlo ka nyi shu/
355a1(mdo 'grel): nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka brgya sum cu/ nyi shu pa'i 'grel bshad/ shlo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po phyed dang gsum/ rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa/ shlo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/ bam po bcu/ rnam par
355a2(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon yon tan blo gros kyis mdzad pa/ shlo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bco lnga/ las bsgrubs pa'i rab tu byed pa/ shlo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig/ de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka stong nyis brgya
355a3(mdo 'grel): ste/ bam po bzhi/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa/ bam po bzhi/ de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka sum stong sum brgya ste/ bam po bcu gcig/ //theg pa chen po'i bstan bcos sna tshogs la/
355a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa kun las btus pa/ shlo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bcu bzhi/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud/ shlo ka sum stong drug brgya ste/ bam po bcu gnyis/ mdo sde? sna tshogs kyi mdo btus
355a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ shlo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/ bam po bdun/ mang kun las btus pa/ shlo ka stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po lnga/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa/ shlo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ rin po che'i
355a6(mdo 'grel): phreng ba/ shlo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka stong nyis brgya ste/ bam po bzhi/ pha rol tu phyin pa btus pa/ shlo ka drug brgya ste/ bam po gnyis/ tshigs su bcad pa'i don 'dus pa/ shlo ka
355a7(mdo 'grel): dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgya/ shes rab brgya pa'i rab tu byed pa/ shlo ka brgya/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ shlo ka bzhi bcu rtsa bdun/ de'i
355b1(mdo 'grel): bshad pa/ shlo ka nyis brgya grogs po'i spring yig /shlo ka brgya/ de'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon blo gros chen pos mdzad pa/ shlo ka stong nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bam po bzhi dang/ shlo ka lnga bcu/ slob ma la spring pa'i spring yig /slob dpon
355b2(mdo 'grel): tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/ shlo ka nyis brgya/ de'i dka' 'grel/ slob dpon bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgya/ rgyal po ka ni ka la springs pa'i spring yig /slob dpon mA ti tsi Tas mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
355b3(mdo 'grel): kyis dge stong rab gsal gzhon nur spring ba'i spring yig shlo ka bcu gnyis/ gces pa brgyad cu pa/ shlo ka brgyad cu/ sdom pa nyi shu pa/ shlo ka nyi shu/ de'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon shAn+ti rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/ bam po gnyis/ tshigs su bcad pa
355b4(mdo 'grel): brgya pa/ slob dpon 'phags pa'i lhas mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgya/ tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod/ slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgya lta ba'i bye brag /slob dpon nyi ma'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgya lnga
355b5(mdo 'grel): bcu/ 'jig rten pha rol bsgrubs pa/ mkhan po ye shes sngos mdzad pa/ shlo ka sum cu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyis rgya cher 'grel pa/ shlo ka brgya rtsa bcu/ de bzhin
355b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa la yon tan mdza' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/ shlo ka sum cu/ de'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ shlo ka bcu/ bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa/ slob dpon
355b7(mdo 'grel): dga' byed snyan pas mdzad pa/ shlo ka dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum/ gsang ba'i gnas su bstong pa'i 'grel pa/ bam po gsum// //theg pa chung ngu'i bstan bcos la chos mngon

356a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ shlo ka khri brgyad stong ste/ bam po drug cu/ yang mdzod kyi 'grel pa/ slob dpon sang g+ha b+ha tras mdzad pa/ shlo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po bco lnga/ yang mdzod kyi 'grel pa/ slob dpon shAn+ti so mas mdzad pa/ shlo ka bzhi

356a7(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs thigs pa/ shlo ka nyis brgya/ de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka sum stong drug brgya ste/ bam po bcu gnyis/ 'brel pa brtag pa/ shlo ka drug brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi/ bam po gnyis dang/ shlo ka nyi shu rtsa bzhi/ dmigs pa brtag pa  
356b1(mdo 'grel): shlo ka brgyad/ de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka sum cu rtsa bzhi de'i 'grel bshad/ shlo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig /rgyud gzhan sgrub pa/ shlo ka brgya de'i 'grel pa/ shlo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa lnga ste/ bam po gcig dang shlo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa lnga/ gzhan sel?
356b2(mdo 'grel): ba grub pa/ shlo ka bdun cu rtsa gnyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa/ shlo ka lnga bcu/ bdag med pa grub pa/ shlo ka bdun cu rtsa gcig phyi rol gyi yul grub pa/ slob dpon shu pa guptas mdzad pa/ shlo ka sum brgya ste/ bam po gcig/

356b7(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po'i bsam gtan gyi man ngag/ gol sa brgyad btsal pa/ btsan pos bkas bcad pa/ shlo ka sum cu// //gsung rab zhu chen ma bgyis pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
357a1(mdo 'grel): stong phrag bzhi pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa chen po gnyis gtan lam phab/ bstan chos sgyur 'phro la/ dbu ma'i gzhung zhib po rnam par
357a2(mdo 'grel): 'thag pa rtsa ba dang/ 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/ dbu ma'i snying po rtog ge 'bar ba rtsa ba dang/ 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/ chad ma rnam 'grel/ bam po bcu gcig/
357a3(mdo 'grel): rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa/ bam po bco brgyad/ bcos pa'i rigs pa/ bam po gcig/ /tshad ma de kho na bsdus pa rtsa ba dang 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/
357a4(mdo 'grel): gsung rab mdo sde dang bstan bcos thams cad la shlo ka dang/ bam po'i grangs gtan la phab ste/ zhu chen zin to 'tshal thams cad 'brug gi lo la pho brang ldan
357a5(mdo 'grel): dkar du mtshan byang dkar chag btab pa rdzogs so// //bkra shis dge'o// //sarba mang+galaM/ //
